algorithm: Selects the item with the largest volume and places it using a bottom-left-back heuristic, prioritizing positions that minimize the increase in total z-coordinate of occupied space.
Prioritizes items with a larger volume for placement, aiming to fill the truck with fewer, larger items before smaller ones and selects the placement that minimizes wasted space.
Prioritizes placing items that best utilize the container's base area, minimizing remaining space on the container floor.
Selects the item type with the smallest remaining quantity and places it using a corner occupancy heuristic, favoring placements that maximize contact area with existing items and container walls.
Chooses the item with the smallest area and attempts to place it using a bottom-left-fill heuristic, selecting the placement that minimizes wasted space on the base of the truck.
